channel.title: Comments on: Recommended Adium Theme: Fiat

item.title: By: Independent Financial Advisor John
item.dc:creator: Independent Financial Advisor John
item.description: I also find Fiat quite attractive. As Fiat only has a small preview of contact pictures I have found that it is possible to add larger avatars and edit the timestamps thus making Fiat an even more versatile theme. Thanks for pointing to the â€˜Green over Blueâ€™ variant which I had overlooked.

item.title: By: Stephane Daury (@stephdau)
item.dc:creator: Stephane Daury (@stephdau)
item.description:
Just realized this is likely inspired by Colloquy, which has Fiat as one of its default styles. :)
